items_added:
✅ Items added to list {list_id}!
📋 View list: {url}
list_duplicated:
🔁 List duplicated. New ID: {list_id}
📋 View list: {url}
list_empty: ❌ The list is empty or does not exist.
start:
👋 Welcome!

📋 Here's how to send a shopping list:

1️⃣ *First line* – The list name (e.g., `Shabbat shopping:`)
✏️ The name must end with `:` or `-` to be recognized.

2️⃣ *Second line* – Items separated by commas:
`2 milk, sliced bread, 6 tomatoes`

🖼️ You can also send a *photo of a handwritten or printed list* – the bot will recognize the text and return a draft you can edit and send.

🛒 After sending, you'll receive links to manage your list: view, duplicate, or delete.
list_completed: ✅ All items in your list have been collected! (#{list_id})
ocr_processing: 🧠 Analyzing the text from your image...
ocr_copy_instruction: 📋 Detected text – copy, edit, and send:
ocr_no_text: ⚠️ No text detected in the image.
ocr_too_fast: ⏳ Please wait a moment — the bot is still processing the image.
confirm_all_collected: האם אספת את כל {{quantity}} היחידות של פריט זה?
